verbose_text: Intriguingly, histamine, which is a recognized substrate of a copper containing amine oxidase distinct from PrAO, namely diamine oxidase, product of AOC1 gene, did not clearly activate glucose uptake in these conditions (XREF_FIG).
evidence: histamine, which is a recognized substrate of a copper-containing amine oxidase distinct from PrAO, namely diamine oxidase, product of AOC1 gene, did not clearly activate glucose
